fieldUpdates.description: Rule to auto-correct any variations of UK, or Scotland/England to "UK"
fieldUpdates.name: Make Consistent Mailing Country UK

fieldUpdates.description: Rule to auto-correct any variations of USA, United States, US, etc to "USA"
fieldUpdates.name: Make Consistent Mailing Country USA

rules.description: Rule Code: CTA-001xFxx Auto-correct Mailing Country USA Auto-corrects Mailing Country for consistency for country code USA
Rule Code: CTA-002xFxx Auto-correct Mailing Country UK Auto-corrects Mailing Country for consistency for country code UK
Rule Code: CTA-003xFxx Auto-correct Mailing Country Australia Auto-corrects Mailing Country for consistency for country code Australia
Rule Code: CTA-004xFxx Auto-correct Mailing Country New Zealand Auto-corrects Mailing Country for consistency for country code New Zealand
Rule Code: CTA-006xFxx Unset Apex Context (Contact) Uncheck the Apex Context checkbox when Apex Context is set to true
Rule Code: CTA-007Exxx PSA Resource Created Sends an email notification whenever a new PSA Resource is created.
Rule Code: CTA-008Exxx Contact Changed Accounts Sends and email notification to Kshama Swamy whenever a contact changes accounts.
Rule Code: CTA-009xxOx UpdateContactInDTE Sends an outbound message in DTE that updates the Contact
Rule Code: CTA-010xFxx Populate Contact Email Address - F..Last Populates a contact's email address on certain conditions
Rule Code: CTA-011xFxx Populate Contact Email Address - F.Last Populates a contact's email address on certain conditions
Rule Code: CTA-012xFxx Populate Contact Email Address - First Populates a contact's email address when it is blank from it's respective account
Rule Code: CTA-013xFxx Populate Contact Email Address - First.Last Populates a contact's email address when it is blank from it's respective account.
Rule Code: CTA-014xFxx Populate Contact Email Address - First_Last Populates a contact's email address when it is blank from it's respective account.
Rule Code: CTA-015xFxx Populate Contact Email Address - Last Populates a contact's email address when it is blank from it's respective account.
Rule Code: CTA-016xFxx Populate Contact Email Address - Last.First Populates a contact's email address when it is blank from it's respective account.

Rule Code: CTA-017EFxx Request Contact Deactivation Notification Sends an email notification to the relevant audience so that they can deactivate contacts, when Request Contact Deactivation is checked
Rule Code: CTA-018Exxx Reference Tracking Status = Nominated Email CS Acct Mgr, Alex Larralde and Chaise Jonson when Reference Tracking Status = 'Nominated' Ticket 42526
Rule Code: CTA-019Exxx Reference Tracking Status = Active Email CS Team using CRD Group or CSMops@Intapp.com when Reference Tracking Status = 'Active'
Rule Code: CTA-020Exxx Reference Tracking Status = Removed Email CS Team using CRD Group or CSMOps@Intapp.com when Reference Tracking Status = 'Removed'
Rule Code: CTA-021xFxx Update Date and who verified contact info Updates 'Date & Time contact info was verified' and 'Contact info last updated by' when 'Information validated' is checked
Rule Code: CTA-022xFxx Experience Certification Expiration Date Populates a contact's Experience Certification Expiration Date when Experience Expertise is set to "Certified"
Rule Code: CTA-023xFxx Integrate Certification Expiration Date Populates a contact's Integrate Certification Expiration Date when Integrate Expertise is set to ''Certified''
Rule Code: CTA-024xFxx Open Certification Expiration Date Populates a contact's Open Certification Expiration Date when Open Expertise is set to "Certified"
Rule Code: CTA-025xFxx Open Cloud Certification Expiration Date Populates a contact's Open Cloud Certification Expiration Date when Open Cloud Expertise is set to "Certified"
Rule Code: CTA-026xFxx Populate Contact Email Address - First-Last Populates a contact's email address when Email field is blank
Rule Code: CTA-027xFxx Populate Contact Email Address - FirstL Populates a contact's email address when it is blank.
Rule Code: CTA-028xFxx Populate Contact Email Address - FirstLast Populates a contact's email address when it is blank
Rule Code: CTA-029xFxx Populate Contact Email Address - FL Populates a contact's email address when it is blank
Rule Code: CTA-030xFxx Populate Contact Email Address - LastF Populates a contact's email address when it is blank
Rule Code: CTA-031xFxx Time Certification Expiration Date Populates a contact's Time Certification Expiration Date when Time Expertise is set to "Certified"
Rule Code: CTA-032xFxx Time Cloud Certification Expiration Date Populates a contact's Time Cloud Certification Expiration Date when Time Cloud Expertise is set to ''Certified''
Rule Code: CTA-033xFxx Walls Certification Expiration Date Populates a contact's Walls Certification Expiration Date when Walls Expertise is set to ""Certified"
Rule Code: CTA-034xFxx Populate Contact Last Confirmed Opt Out when Confirmed Opt Out is checked.
Rule Code: CTA-035xFxx Update Shipping Address This rule makes the shipping address on the contact the same as the shipping address on the account, as long as there

Rule Code: CTA-036xFxx Update CSM Account Mgr Field on Contact Updates CSD/M email on Contact from CSM Account Mgr on Account; works in conjunction with Process Builder rule: 'Update CSM Account Manager email address on Contacts & Opportunities v2"
Rule Code: CTA-037xFxx Populate Contact Original Opt Out Date when Opt Out field is changed and prior value was blank
Rule Code: CTA-038Exxx Detach Contact Notification Sends an email notification, when Detached Contact had related PCC
updates CCPA Compliance
Rule Code: CTA-039Exxx Detach Contact Notification Sends an email notification to Jose Fernandes, when Detached Contact was Champion or Economic buyer on Open Opportunities
